pr_title: Allow 9-point touch tap gestures for tablets

timeline.message: Gestures on Links: Disable if gestures disabled

Add Corner Touch mode for gestures

This feature will help tablet users get the most of the gesture system

Fixes 7537

timeline.bodyText:
Touch top center? I think all the strings should be XY specified now with nothing implied, e.e
top left
top center
top right
middle left
middle center
middle right
bottom left
bottom center
bottom right
Otherwise top / middle / bottom are ambiguous in context of other left/right ones, to me?
